alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Pembina; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 4:42AM CST until December 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Light freezing rain this morning, transitions to snow by late afternoon. Then periods of heavy snow into Wednesday morning. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
